documents.name: Passport Copy
documents.description: The Current & Old Passport must be completely coloured scanned including passport first page, last page, all stamped pages, white and unused pages. Scan must be 300 dpi quality.

documents.name: Air Tickets
documents.description: Copy of confirmed Arrival and Departure tickets.

documents.name: Hotel Tickets
documents.description: Copy of confirmed Hotel reservation showcasing address, contact number, applicant's name and reservation dates. All destinations if multiple.

documents.name: Salary Slips
documents.description: Recent salary slips (if employed).

documents.name: Passport
documents.description: Passport Front and Back.

documents.name: Photograph
documents.description: 35x45 mm, White Background, No specs.

documents.name: Flight Tickets
documents.description: Copy of confirmed Air tickets.

documents.name: Hotel Tickets
documents.description: Confirmed hotel bookings for stay.

documents.name: Bank e-Statement
documents.description: 3 Months bank statement with a minimum balance of 1.5 Lacs per person.

documents.name: Salary Slips
documents.description: Last 3 months salary slips.

documents.name: Employer NOC
documents.description: NOC from employer on company letterhead.

documents.name: Cover Letter
documents.description: Cover letter on company letterhead.

documents.name: GST Certificate
documents.description: Business registration certificate.

documents.name: Pension Proof
documents.description: Last 3 months Pension statement or Retirement Certificate.

documents.name: Travel Insurance
documents.description: Coverage for the entire travel period.

documents.name: Visa or Residence Proof
documents.description: Valid visa or residence permit issued by EU, Schengen, USA, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Russia, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain or Oman.

documents.name: Student ID
documents.description: Official School/Institution ID.

documents.name: Invitation Letter
documents.description: Invitation letter from friends or family in Armenia.

documents.name: If Employed
documents.description: Original Leave sanctioned certificate with company seal and signature; Last 3 months salary slips.

documents.name: If Self Employed
documents.description: Business Registration License / MOA / Partnership Deed; Company’s bank statement (6 months); PAN registration.

documents.name: If Retired
documents.description: Proof of retirement like pension book or statement.

documents.name: If Student
documents.description: School/College/Institute ID Card and Bonafide certificate.

documents.name: If Minor
documents.description: Birth Certificate; No Objection Certificate from parents/non-accompanying parent on Rs 100/- stamp paper; ID proof of parent.

documents.name: If Visiting Friend/Relative
documents.description: Invitation letter; Inviter’s ID proof like Passport or Resident Permit; Address proof (electricity bill, utility bill etc.).

documents.name: If Sponsored
documents.description: Sponsorship letter / Electronic letter of guarantee (EVE) if invited by sponsor in Austria; Sponsor’s national ID proof; Updated 6-month bank statement.
